page.title: 17LOCAL TRADE
page.content: THE ONLY SHOP IN THE AREA IS A GENERAL STORE.IT SELLS FOOD,FRUIT&VEGETABLES AND FROZEN GOODS. THE MAIN TRADE OF THE AREA IS THE SALE OF VENISON.THIS IS SOLD IN CARCASE FORM MAINLY TO GERMANY. A LIMITED AMOUNT OF SEA FOOD IS CAUGHT OFFSHORE.THIS IS ALL SOLD LOCALLY. THE SHEEP&CATTLE ARE TAKEN ON THE HOOF TO MARKETS OUT WITH THE AREA. WOOD IS SOLD IN VERY LIMITED QUANTITIES FOR FENCING AND STOBS. THE AREA IS RUN AS A BUISNESS ENTERPRISE BY KNOYDART PENINSULA LTD. LETTING HOUSES FOR HOLIDAY PURPOSES AND IN CONJUNCTION WITH SPORTING ACTIVITIES. A RECENT EXPERIMENT WAS A LOCAL CRAFT SHOP SELLING GOODS MADE IN THE AREA. THIS HOWEVER HAS NOT BEEN CONTINUED THOUGH IT MAY BE REVIVED IN THE FUTURE.
